allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: add missing import for database authentication initialization

Changes made:
- Added `get_cached_supabase_client` to imports from `legal_rag_utils`
- Fixed function call to pass required `config` parameter

Problem solved:
When running the MCP server in HTTP mode with database-backed
authentication \(`MCP_API_AUTH_DB_ENABLED=true`\), the server would
crash with `NameError: name ''get_cached_supabase_client'' is not defined`.
The function was called but never imported, and was missing its
required config argument.

Additional:
- Added CHANGELOG.md to document this critical bug fix and provide
  troubleshooting context for future reference

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
